title: Interactive ML Glossary
description: An interactive glossary of key Machine Learning terms with tooltips.

terms.definition: A subset of AI focused on building systems that learn from data
A type of ML where the model learns from labeled data
A type of ML where the model learns patterns from unlabeled data
A type of ML that uses neural networks with multiple layers

functionality.tooltipBehavior: Tooltips appear when hovering over a term and disappear when the mouse moves away.
